page.title: 12CHILDRENS GAMES_STUCK_IN_MUD
page.content: Any number of players may take part in this game. One person is 'it' and he/she counts up to 10 whilst the rest run away. Then, the person who is 'it' tries to catch the others. When someone is caught they are 'stuck_in_mud' and they have to stand with their legs apart. If one of the free players manages to dive through the legs of a player who is 'stuck_in_mud' then the captured player is free. If a player is caught three times he/she is 'it'. Also a player cannot be caught if they stop under the legs of a captured player.
